statements: SELECT * FROM patient_lab_results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM patient_lab_results WHERE test_result = 'Normal';
SELECT test_date, provider_id FROM patient_lab_results WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_result FROM patient_lab_results WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_lab_results WHERE test_name IN ('Blood Test', 'Urinalysis') ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_lab_results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM patient_lab_results WHERE test_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_lab_results WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT test_name, COUNT(*) AS test_count FROM patient_lab_results GROUP BY test_name;
SELECT provider_id, AVG(CAST(test_result AS FLOAT)) AS avg_result FROM patient_lab_results GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_result FROM LabTestResults ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '2000-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM LabTestResults;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, LabTestResults.test_name, LabTestResults.test_result FROM Patients JOIN LabTestResults ON Patients.patient_id = LabTestResults.patient_id WHERE test_date >= '2021-01-01' AND test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, LabTestResults.test_name, LabTestResults.test_date FROM Patients LEFT JOIN LabTestResults ON Patients.patient_id = LabTestResults.patient_id WHERE test_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(date_of_birth)) AS age FROM Patients GROUP BY age HAVING age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result='Positive';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider IS NOT NULL;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT test_name, result FROM LabTests ORDER BY test_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT test_id, provider_id, request_date FROM TestRequests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, email FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT Patients.name, LabTests.test_name, LabTests.result FROM Patients JOIN LabTests ON Patients.id = LabTests.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.name, Providers.provider_name, TestRequests.request_date FROM Patients JOIN TestRequests ON Patients.id = TestRequests.patient_id JOIN Providers ON TestRequests.provider_id = Providers.provider_id WHERE TestRequests.request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT count(*), Patients.age FROM Patients GROUP BY age HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LabTests WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' AND test_date <= '2022-03-31';

SELECT d.doctor_name, p.patient_name, t.test_name, tr.result_value FROM Doctors d JOIN DoctorAssignments da ON d.doctor_id = da.doctor_id JOIN Patients p ON da.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN LabTests t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN TestResults tr ON t.test_id = tr.test_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.patient_name, LabTests.test_date FROM Patients JOIN LabTests ON Patients.patient_id = LabTests.patient_id WHERE LabTests.test_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialization, Patient.patient_name FROM Doctors JOIN DoctorAssignments ON Doctors.doctor_id = DoctorAssignments.doctor_id JOIN Patients ON DoctorAssignments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, TestResults.result_value FROM Patients LEFT JOIN TestResults ON Patients.patient_id = TestResults.test_id WHERE TestResults.result_date <= '2022-05-31';
